description.name: nexoerc20
description.tagline: NEXO erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-nexo Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept NEXO erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/nexo receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/nexo wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
